alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 16 at 9:08AM EST until December 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern Penobscot, Interior Hancock, Central Washington, Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
